content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Academic skills are the tools you use on a daily basis as a student. You may not have lectures on these skills, but they are an important part of your studies. Every one studies differently, and we'll help you to find the approach that works for you. Our Learning Development team are here to help you find the study method that works for you and to develop your skills. Explore a wide range of online resources including videos, quizzes and downloads designed to help you find your study style. Academic Skills resources Weekly themed webinars Request a one-to-one session Study with us online - join our weekly study sessions Visit our support for teaching page to find out more about how we can support your students. Back to the top King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
